fsdict::LevFilter::CandidateReceiver

fsdict::LevFilter::CandidateReceiver Class Reference

This is an interface to be implemented by each class that wants to receive candidates from some LevFilter implementation. More...

Detailed Description

This is an interface to be implemented by each class that wants to receive candidates from some LevFilter implementation.
